title: 616. No Such Thing As Pudsey's Passport
content:
Professor Alice Roberts joins Dan, James and Andy at the Royal Institution to find out what links science with Pokemon, Superman and Tintin.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
